features: ✔️【Preventing Skin Aging】Glycolic acid 7% toning resurfacing solution contains botanical extracts that accelerate cell renewal and promote collagen synthesis, thus preventing skin aging, energizing your skin and making you look more youthful and beautiful.

✔️【Exfoliates & Brightens Skin Tone】Glycolic acid peel for face, gently exfoliates and deep cleanses your skin to improve the appearance of blemishes and acne. It also brightens and evens out your skin tone, leaving you with perfect skin condition.
✔️【Waterproof & Moisturizing】Glycolic acid serum has a moisturizing ingredient that nourishes your skin and restores its hydration and elasticity, giving you a nourishing and comfortable experience.

✔️【Minimize Pores】Facial exfoliation astringe pores glycolic acid 7% of the texture of the refreshing, a wipe of water smooth as silk penetration, does not leave a sticky skin feeling, suitable for use in wet compresses, can be timely clean and shrink pores, so that your skin is more delicate, smoother.

✔️【Quality Formulas】Glycolic acid 7% toner is formulated with premium quality to give your skin total pampering and moisturizing, skin-friendly, suitable for all types of skin types, it is a beautiful gift for your mom, loved ones, girlfriends.
body.description: 🍀Glycolic acid 7% toning resurfacing solution gently exfoliates, deep cleanses your skin, improves the appearance of your facial blemishes and acne, brightens and evens skin tone, accelerates cellular renewal, promotes collagen synthesis, prevents skin aging, and leaves you with a perfect skin condition. It is enriched with moisturizing ingredients to keep your skin hydrated and elastic, and is formulated with premium quality ingredients that are gentle and friendly to your skin, suitable for all types of skin types. 🥝Features: 🥝-Easily exfoliates and cleanses the face 🥝-Improves facial blemishes and acne, brightens and evens skin tone 🥝-Stimulates collagen production 🥝-Enriched with moisturizing ingredients to keep your skin hydrated 🥝-Used high quality formula, skin friendly 🐾Specification: 🐾Quantity: 1 Pcs 🐾Weight: 3.38 fl.oz 🐾Size: 5.19 x 1.73 x 1.73 in
